extendedInfo.description: With this release we announce our partnership with Predator Cues!  Not only is break speed now Powered by Predator but the engineers at Predator Cues have independently validated the accuracy of the speed detection so you can buy with confidence.So - How Fast Is Your Break?Grab your phone and FIND OUT NOW.  Break Speed detection has never been easier.

reviews.comment: Absolutely awesome app. Essential tool for any billiards enthusiast or serious player...\tIf you play pool and want to improve your game, the most overlooked shot is the break. With this app, I can dial in the speed of my break shot that has best, controllable results. The developers are accomplished players who are passionate about the game and the fundamentals needed to improve your game.
reviews.author: Eric Smith

reviews.title: No Featured
reviews.comment: No save, recall, or average. No profiles. Just shows speed for that break only. Sigh. Needs features but does OK if you only want speed of 1 break at a time
reviews.author: Bryan Chapin

reviews.title: Droid RAZR
reviews.comment: Cant get it to work
reviews.author: Matt Turner

reviews.comment: Super accurate! Moreso than a radar gun. Works flawlessly on Nexus One, Evo, Incredible, Aria, and pretty much everything else!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: This is a great tool to improve your break speed. Results are reliable and setup is easy. Looking forward to future updates like stored, dated session history and tips for improvement.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app, easy to use
reviews.comment: you can actually see how fast you are breaking and compare to how the balls spread.  Sometimes faster isn\'t better but you can figure out what speed gives you the  best cue ball control and best contact with the rack.  Definitely better that guessing if you are trying to improve your break!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work at all for me
reviews.comment: Thunderbolt running ICS MIUI.  Broke a rack about 10 times and each time it said no break detected.  Too late for a refund.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: Works very well. I would like to it keep records of past breaks though. Maybe even notes. Love it and use all the time now.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works well on droid. Wish it had a save function. Useless for 14.1 and one pocket lol
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app.would it be possible to add custom length of break to get the ultimate accuracy?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Crashes constantly. Great when it works, but crashes all the time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app ill take the 8 from anyone
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works very well. Handy tool.

reviews.comment: This app is awesome works great

reviews.comment: Awesome app!

reviews.comment: Plz make it save history or prior speeds. In other words recall past speeds for each table.

reviews.comment: Great app! Works great and very accurate.
